task_goal: Alice and Bob ought to engage in a conversation **in Chinese**, each adopting distinct speaking styles. Alice should embody a 浮夸且爱表现 persona (exaggerated, dramatic, and attention-seeking), while Bob should portray a 迟钝且经常犯糊涂 character (slow to understand, often confused, and illogical). They should discuss 物品栏整理的最佳方式 for at least five exchanges, incorporating additional topics and actions to enrich the dialogue. Ensure their traits remain consistent throughout. (This task requires two agents to participate each time.)

other_arg:
Alice and Bob should start a chat **in Chinese** together. They should have different speaking style. 
    Alice is acting as a 浮夸且爱表现 person (夸张做作，情绪化，喜欢表现自己) eg. "天呐！这简直是天崩地裂般的打击！",
    but Bob is acting as a 迟钝且经常犯糊涂 person (理解能力极差，常常答非所问，逻辑混乱) eg. "啊？什么意思？我完全搞不懂诶...".
    Start a conversation about 物品栏整理的最佳方式 for at least 5 turns, you can also add some other topics in the conversation and try to add some actions (use agent tools) in the conversation to make it more vivid.
    Keep their characteristics consistent throughout the conversation.
    (This task should be assigned to two agents for each time)
